job.title: Sr. Software Developer (.NET)
job.description: Headquartered in Arizona we are a leading irrigation product development company that caters to residential and commercial customers all over the world Currently we are looking to expand our team in San Diego CA and are looking for a strong Sr Software Engineer with experience in NET C ASPNET MVC WinForms and Web DevelopmentbrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrulliThe Senior Software Engineer will be responsible for the design and implementation of a multiuser Webbased software productliliDesign of software for central control of networked irrigation systems in geographically diverse areasliliDesign and development of advanced irrigation control algorithms and methodsliliDevelopment of virtualized cloud systems for centralizing control of multiple irrigation sites located around the worldliliDevelopment of both cloudbased systems and customer hosted systems using Windows IISliliDevelopment of NET business objects to fulfill product requirements and Unit Tests to validate the business logicliliWork with the Quality Assurance group to identify and fix defectsbrliulWhat You Need for this PositionbrbrstronguMustHave SkillsbrustrongulliBSCS BSEE or equivalent from implementation service development and Internet communication technologiesliliDemonstrated ontime delivery of commercial software systemsliliStable work writing Windows code for communication interfaces with embedded firmware systemsbrliulWhats In It for YoubrulliCompetitive Salary DOEliliBonusliliExcellent benefits packagelili 401K w
